fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: To follow up current status of EU initiatives related with european deposit insurance scheme, deposit guarantee schemes directive, single resolution mechanism regulation, bank recovery and resolution directive.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: KDIC was established under the Korea Deposit Insurance Act to protect depositors and ensure the stability of the financial system by guaranteeing the payment of deposits when a bank can not make deposits due to bankruptcy or other reasons.
